title: Indonesia: the land and the people
brief_description: A survey of the Republic of Indonesia, including its geographical location, weather, soil, and agriculture. Mention is made of the population, of the different religions, languages, and crafts; the unique life with dancing and music daily, the use of the market place, and the cluster of homes of members of one clan. Products of the country are pictured and stress placed on importance of foreign trade.
